full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA nI'I SGRUB THABS ZAB MO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,DE LTAR PHAN YON CHE LA SGRUB SLA BA'I, ,MAN NGAG ZAB MO KHYAD PAR 'PHAGS PA 'DI, ,RIGS CHOS SLOB BU CHOS DBANG RDO RJE YIS, ,BSKUL BA'I BYED @003B PO DAM PAS BYIN RLABS PA'I, ,YO KI DZNY'A NA BADZRA ZHES BYA BAS, SNGON BYON DAM PA RNAMS KYIS GSUNGS PA BZHIN, ,RANG LO GYA LNGAR YI GER BRIS PA 'DI, ,GLEGS BUR BKOD PA RAB 'BYAMS BLO GROS SO,, ,,BKRA SHIS PA DANG DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,DGE'O,, ,,
